DOC.detailed_description: Levamisole immunomodulator drug demonstrate improve immune response HBV vaccination hemodialysis patient . The aim study evaluate effect levamisole supplementation Td vaccine response rate hemodialysis patient . In randomized double-blind placebo-controlled trial 40 hemodialysis patient receive tetanus vaccination year investigation unprotective anti-tetanus immunoglobulin G ( IgG ) level ( < 0.1 International Unit [ IU ] /ml ) enrol . These patient randomize two equal group receive one dose intramuscular Td vaccine supplement either levamisole 100 mg placebo daily , six day six day vaccination . The anti-tetanus IgG level measure 1 6 month vaccination .
